title: Lowest Bribery Incidence Among Firms
description: In 2019, only 0.2% of firms in Lithuania reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, showcasing the country's strong stance against corruption.

title: Universal Formal Registration of Firms
description: As of 2019, 100% of firms in Lithuania were formally registered when they started operations, indicating a robust regulatory environment.

title: High Statistical Performance in Data Products
description: Lithuania achieved a score of 94.31 in the Statistical Performance Indicators for Pillar 3 data products in 2023, reflecting its excellence in data management and dissemination.

title: Minimal Male Primary School Dropout Rate
description: In 2021, only 0.0289% of male children of primary school age were out of school in Lithuania, highlighting the country's commitment to education.

title: Few Male Children Out of School
description: In 2021, only 17 male children of primary school age were not attending school in Lithuania, underscoring the nation's effective educational policies.
